name: Divine Comedy
flavor: You and your allies swap places to confound your foes.
target: Self and each ally in the area

metadata.flavor: You and your allies swap places to confound your foes.
metadata.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target can choose another creature in the area, then swap places with that creature. The creature they choose must be able to fit into the space they leave and vice versa.
